item.description:
Let's gather around 6 pm behind the Burtucci restaurant in Lexington. I drive a green Mitsubishi convertible look for me in the parking lot! There is a pay parking lot behind the restaurant with low rates.

We will ride toward Arlington leaving at 6:15 for a total ride of 1hr 15 minutes cuz the sun sets at 730 so we should be back at the restaurant in time for dinner or at least a beer! We will be going at a moderate pace and it is the last chance before the temps dip down to cold for the weekend :-( My cell is 9786213029 Patty
item.how_to_find_us: Meet on Mass Ave outside of Bertucci's
item.name: After work Bikeand dinner! Minuteman trail in Lexington
